paragraphs: I've got a buyer for five soul gems and five skyshards. He's offering a premium price. I mean, you could buy Glenumbra with this kind of gold! Well, maybe not all of Glenumbra, but you get my point. Wealth for your sons and your sons' sons, and all that.
Now, I don't know where you're going to find these things, and I don't care. But you're going to find them. Right? We need this score.
